short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes tracking elements from a web address.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes the following tracking parameters from a web address:
 - _ga
 - fbclid
 - hss_channel
 - utm_campaign
 - utm_content
 - utm_medium
 - utm_source
 - utm_term
- utm_sq
- utm_creative
- utm_id
- utm_brand
- utm_social-type
- mbid
- dclid

No impact to the functionality.
